form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: PETITION TO CLASSIFY STATUS OF ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA GRANT VISA, N-4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 7 Form approved Budget Bureau No. 43-R0401 PETITION TO Date filed Fee CLASSIFY STATUS OF stamp & ALIEN RELATIVE FOR ISSUANCE OF IMMI- GRANT VISA TO THE SECRETARY OF STATE: SAN Manersco. CA HFC 05 PM 372 The petition was filed on The petition is approved for status under W Remarks section: U.S. APPROVED INS. SPOUSE, 201 (b) CHILD 203(a) (2) DATE JAN 9 1973 OF ACTION 201 (b) PARENT 203 (a) (4) DD SAN FRANQISCO, CAR 203 (a) (1) 203 (a) (5) DISTRICT (PETITIONER IS NOT TO WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE) 1. Petition is hereby made to classify the status of the alien beneficiary for issuance of an immigrant visa as: (Check one) The spouse, child (regardless of age), parent, brother, or sister of a United States citizen. The spouse or unmarried child (regardless of age) of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. NO RECORD SFR Block 1. - Information About Alien Beneficiary 12.21-73 2. Name (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 3.DoNotW rite in This Space 4. Relationship of beneficiary to petitioner ADVANI RURMANI DEVI MOTHER 5. Other names used; Married woman give maiden name A20 337 856 6. Is beneficiary related to you by adoption? RUKMANI MIRCHAND No 7. Place of birth (Country) 8. Date of birth (Month, day, year) 9. Beneficiary's marital status: CYDERABAD SIND Nove IN Paleishan JAN 15,1907 Married Widowed Divorced Single 10. Petitioner name (Last in CAPS) (First) 11. Petitioner's phone 12. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of beneficiary's children, if any 1 MANGHA T. ADVAN, - May 29th 1925, HYDEABAD - MorsinPAKISTAN 4 PREMU G. ADVANI July12n 1938 LAHORE -Now in PAKISTAN 2 MOHAN T. ADVANI - May 3rd 1934, LAHORE -Nowin PAKISTAN 5 MEENAKSHI T ADVANI 3 GULU T. ADVANI - Feb 22nd 1936 Aug. 28th 1944 - INDIA 15. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) See attachment 16. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: Not Applicable a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Number of your prior marriages c. Number of prior marriages of spouse For Statistics d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together in Eetd-Tx. Out From Complete. To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) JAN 8- 1973 (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Month) YOUN a 107311 17. If this petition is for a child, (a). Is the child married? (b) Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state Not applicable 18. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? N.A If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 19. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner Not applica bie 20. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? No If so, give place and date of filing and result: Form 1-130 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE - Immigration and Naturalization Service (Rev. 11-1-70) Y
